Articles.Content:
Hey, I'm Chillin'. I decided to join this forum as I love KSP. I joined the Bulbagarden Forums a month ago, for Pokemon, where I met a waterlubber there. He loved KSP as much as me and I discovered he is on this forum as well. Today, I decided to join this forum because of both these reasons. I hope I will have a swell time here!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T03:37:30Z" title="04/20/2015 03:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by ChillinMcMillan**
Hello and welcome to our forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Thank you so much! That was quick!

Welcome! I've seen waterlubber a handful times in the forums myself, too.

Have fun! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

No no no no! Now I wanna play Pokemon blue or red until KSP 1.0 turns up! I'm 25 for heavens sake!

Anyway, welcome to the forums and thanks for the reminder of how much I loved that game!

Tweety
Oi, hey there Chillin! Welcome, and avoid the forum kraken.
Thanks guys! It looks like i'll have a good time here!
